name: Vo
description:
! Before entering the canyon you need to place an escape rope at the end of the canyon! There is no more escape after an altitude of 510m, and the canyon ends immediately in Isorno, on a spot where it has a big siphon.

Otherwise it's a nice trip with some narrows, some jumps (last one is about 18m), and good rappels.

Approach

On the orographic right side of the bridge at 619m, there is a path going up to 645m.

Descent

At the start there are some possibilities to escape, but the longer it goes on, the steeper the walls of the canyon will get.

Exit

Go up the 30m rope you put on the right hand side at the end of the canyon. Then follow the ridge until you arrive at the first houses of Loco.

Red tape
